page.title: 04The People of Hoddlesden
page.content: From our survey we have found out that a lot of people in the village are in the (31-45) & (0-15) age groups.We have decided this was because there are a lot of adults with children that fall into these 2 groups.The old people tend to live in the old part of the village & a few have lived here all their lives.Many people have moved here from the Blackburn area because of their job or marriage, or because they liked the area.A lot of people have cars in the village & the most popular pets are dogs.Most people in the village work full time in industry and public service.Most people use the post office regularly and the church is well attended.They use the other village amenities occasionally.The community centre is well used by different groups.The mobile facilities are not well used.People go to Darwen.
